summary: Completed frontend testing of redesigned navigation with Solutions dropdown in primary sidebar, module tabs in top nav, and secondary sidebar with same blue color theme. All 7 requested features are working correctly.

minor.issue: 401 Unauthorized errors when loading Finance Cash Flow data

console_warnings.issue: React warning: Each child in a list should have a unique 'key' prop

solutions_dropdown_in_primary_sidebar.description: Solutions dropdown in primary sidebar shows all 5 solutions when clicked
solutions_dropdown_in_primary_sidebar.dropdown_behavior: Opens on click, closes when solution selected or clicked outside

clicking_solution_updates_modules_in_top.description: Clicking a solution updates the module tabs in top navigation

module_tabs_in_top_nav.description: Module tabs in top nav are clickable without dropdowns, clicking changes secondary sidebar submodules

secondary_sidebar_blue_color_theme.description: Secondary sidebar has same blue gradient color (from-[#0449B8] to-[#3A4E63]) as primary sidebar and top nav
secondary_sidebar_blue_color_theme.color_consistency: All navigation elements use consistent blue gradient theme

secondary_sidebar_header_behavior.description: Secondary sidebar header shows solution name when expanded, icon when collapsed
secondary_sidebar_header_behavior.expanded_state: Shows solution icon + solution shortName + 'Solution' subtitle

critical_code_review_comments: LeadListFinal.jsx has React key prop warning - should add unique key to list items (minor, carried over from previous iterations)
Finance Cash Flow API returns 401 errors - may need authentication token refresh or API endpoint fix
context_for_next_testing_agent: Navigation redesign complete and verified. Features working: 1) Solutions dropdown in primary sidebar with all 5 solutions, 2) Clicking solution updates module tabs in top nav, 3) Module tabs are clickable without dropdowns, 4) Secondary sidebar has same blue color theme, 5) Secondary sidebar header shows solution name when expanded/icon when collapsed, 6) Navigation between modules works correctly, 7) Active state highlighting on module tabs and submodules. Minor issues: React key prop warning in LeadListFinal, 401 errors on Finance Cash Flow API.
